title: All Ball - Preseason #1 Gonzaga HC Mark Few Discusses Title Pressure, Philosophy, Recruiting, 2020 Disappointment, 2021 Uncertainty
itunes:title: All Ball - Preseason #1 Gonzaga HC Mark Few Discusses Title Pressure, Philosophy, Recruiting, 2020 Disappointment, 2021 Uncertainty
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by Gonzaga Head Coach Mark Few to discuss his team's #1 preseason ranking, how he continues to recruit the right players to fit the program, the disappointment of the a COVID shortened 2020 season, how he's approaching the uncertainty of the 2021 season, and what he's learned coaching international hoop. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
